Sentencas: Sealing properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy (Bi-Ba-Si-O) glass was studied.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) of the Bi-Ba-Si-O glass is 11x10(-6) K-1 (50 similar to 530 degrees C), which can be matched with 8YSZ electrolyte (CTE: 10.2x10(-6) K-1) and SUS430 steel interconnect (CTE: 11.3x10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: The suitable sealing temperature of Bi-Ba-Si-O glass is (720 +/- 50) degrees C, during which the Bi-Ba-Si-O glass shows a very good thermal stability, especially at 720 degrees C.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: The SUS430 metallic interconnect and 8YSZ electrolyte could be well adhered by this glass.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: It is indicated that Si, Ba and Bi in the glass transmit to electrolyte and steel interconnect, whereas the Fe, Cr in the steel are more stable which show less transition.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: The transition of different elements to each other is helpful to form tightly adhere, as well as it may be related to the long term performance of components.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing

Sentencas: As a conclusion, the Bi-Ba-Si-O glass could be used as sealing materials in SOFC.
Titulo: Properties of Bi2O3-BaO-SiO2-RxOy Glass for Sealing
